name: Rubix Roller
description:
This puzzle strategy colour game requires thinking and planning ahead.

Procedural level generation gives you an endless and unique gameplay experience Every Single Time.
Features 5 different modes including 2 player split screen duel.
Player customization, upgrades, and powers.
Thanks for playing and have fun!

Can also be played at this link for better mobile viewing:  https://simmer.io/@Elliott98/rubix-roller

HD executable can be downloaded from: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1VXKtvt5mns-3xCnwCnbi2rLe5Oqz--PA?usp=sharing

Assets created in 3ds max, photoshop and toolbag3.
